actions.name: Build Armbian SDK
actions.description: Builds the Armbian SDK for specified boards and operating systems, generating virtual images for x86 and arm64 architectures. It includes a keep-alive job to prevent GitHub from suspending the cron job and utilizes a matrix strategy to build for multiple configurations. The build process incorporates various parameters such as release titles, tags, and optional extensions.
actions.cron_schedule: at 0 minutes past the hour, at 3:00

actions.name: Delete Old Releases
actions.description: Deletes old releases from the repository by identifying and removing both full and pre-releases that exceed a specified limit. It processes releases based on their creation date and removes the oldest ones, ensuring only the most recent releases are retained.
actions.cron_schedule: at 0 minutes past the hour, at 3:00
